title: Sustainable Suburban Retreat: Modern Apartment Surrounded by Nature
description: Experience eco-conscious living in this contemporary, light-filled apartment offering two spacious bedrooms and two modern bathrooms across 68 square meters. Floor-to-ceiling energy-efficient windows frame sweeping green views, complemented by state-of-the-art air conditioning and a stylish, open-concept living area. Designed for modern flexibility, a dedicated co-working space invites productivity without leaving home, while the stylish video intercom ensures privacy and security. The calm low-urban Suburb neighborhood provides a peaceful atmosphere, perfect for those seeking space to grow—inside and out.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Nowy Sacz's vibrant Suburb, enjoy the comforts of an artsy, outdoor-focused community surrounded by greenbelt and creative inspiration. Pop-up galleries and local makers flourish while design-conscious pet owners will appreciate walking paths and dog-friendly spots. Rapid highway connections offer seamless access to the city center and nearby nature reserves, fostering both convenience and escape.
lifestyle_benefits: ideal for pet owners with spacious walkways and dog-friendly areas
inspiring creativity with a local artistic community
quiet precinct basics with fast city access
target_buyer: Eco-minded professionals, creatives, or young families who cherish sustainable design, need practical home office space, and value their pets' comfort as much as their own well-being.
market_positioning: This apartment combines contemporary eco-features and suburban tranquility using efficient layouts rarely found in the local market at this price, especially suited to pet-owning buyers who prioritize their lifestyle, work balance, and proximity both to nature and city infrastructure.
